Description:
PERFECT FAMILY HOME IN CENTRAL EPPING
It's all about the location and the wonderful lifestyle opportunity with this immaculately presented contemporary family home, nestled in a quiet family friendly court locale, in arguably one of the most sought after pockets of Epping Central where everything you need is at your doorstep. Just a leisurely stroll to Dalton Village Shopping precinct, cafes, eateries, Epping train station, bus services, an excellent choice of schools including St Monica's College, Melbourne Polytechnic and only minutes to Pacific Plaza, COSTCO, Northern Hospital and easy access to major freeways. Showcasing timeless elegance, a grand double door entrance leads to a generously appointed floor plan with multiple living areas, offering style, comfort and space, providing loads of room for the growing family. Boasting formal lounge room with feature electric fire place, separate dining area, master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robes, additional 3 bedrooms all with built in robes serviced by huge family bathroom, bonus powder room and study. The bright, well equipped kitchen is centrally located to create a defined family hub and includes stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, wall oven, 900 mm rangehood and dishwasher, further complemented by spacious living/meals area and good sized separate laundry. Blessed with a very desirable north facing rear aspect great for warmth and natural light, entertain, relax and enjoy the paved alfresco area overlooking neat, low maintenance landscaped gardens with plenty of room for the kids to play and run around. Features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, carpets to bedrooms, tiles throughout, quality light fittings and window furnishings,high ceilings with decorative cornices, neutral colour decor, drive through remote controlled double garage plus so much more.
Insights: 3 Elaine Close, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2020 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Investors Delight Leased at $1651 per calendar month
If you're looking for the perfect investment opportunity, you simply cannot afford to miss this one.
This immaculately presented home provides space and comfort for the family, boasting three spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite, all other bedrooms with built in robes, spacious kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher overlooking the meals & living area which lead to the outdoor area.
Other features include heating, split system cooling, landscaped gardens, double garage with internal access & much more.
Located in the Aurora Estate opposite Harvest Home Primary School, and with the added convenience of transport and Aurora Shopping Village within walking distance this home needs to be seen to be truly appreciated.
Currently tenanted on a lease until 26/12/2020 at $380 per week ($1,651 pcm).

Description:
Family Upgrade in Central Epping
Set in the heart of Epping, on a large allotment of 655m2 (approx), this home offers an excellent opportunity for larger or growing families. Less than 45 minutes to the CBD on the Mernda Train line, you will enjoy easy access to Epping Train Station plus local amenities including Pacific Epping, the Northern Hospital and the Ring Road network. All levels of education are catered for from reputable early learning centres through to St Monica's College and Melbourne Polytechnic and the Darebin Creek Trail and nearby playgrounds provide an excellent balance for healthy living.
Downstairs, 4 bedrooms serviced by a revamped central bathroom, well-appointed open plan kitchen adjoining meals and a spacious living room overlooking the outside entertainment area. Head upstairs to the bright and inviting retreat which leads into the huge master bedroom with ensuite. Ideal for someone with a keen eye for quality, this family home represents an outstanding opportunity to move in and enjoy as is, or update and personalise with your own modern touch.
Features include heating, cooling, s/s appliances, timber fireplace, outside undercover pergola area, water tank, dual garden sheds and much more.
An opportunity rarely seen and a must to inspect.
Corona Virus inspection policy will be in place to enact social distancing.

Description:
"35 Square Home on 936m2 Land"
A neat and complete family home offering a wonderful opportunity for the growing family to enjoy the generous size indoor and outdoor spaces.
Comprises 4 massive bedrooms with full ensuite & WIR to master, formal entry leading to formal lounge and dining, separate study room, open plan kitchen, meals & family room with an additional Rumpus/TV room.
Together with double garage equipped with a fully functional kitchenette, Alfresco, undercover outdoor dining area, color- bond workshop located at the rear of the block & lovely manicured gardens.
The property can also accommodate several cars, boat, caravan and trailers.
Other features include solid timber floors through-out, ducted heating, ducted cooling, down-lights, solar power (16 Panels), dishwasher and much more to be revealed upon inspection.
A great location within easy access to Westfield plenty valley, Epping train station, Pacific Epping shopping centre, Western road, mixture of football clubs, tennis and soccer clubs.
ideal family home.
Internal area
320m²

Description:
Exceptional Family Home in Lyndarum Estate
Expressions of Interest Closing 3rd May by 5.00pm
This 4-bedroom plus a study room is proudly sitting on large 512m² of premium land and has two master bedrooms in wonderful family friendly neighbourhood, offering comfort, convenience and space. The moment you step inside, you will be greeted with wide entrance, an opulent master bedroom with walk in robes and full ensuite, formal lounge, study/office leading to gourmet kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone bench top & dishwasher overlooking living and dining area and a theatre room.
The highlight of the house is an additional master bedroom with full ensuite and BIR, 2- other generous sized bedrooms well serviced by spacious central bathroom.
Step outside to large decked outdoor entertainment arena to entertain friends and family member for years to come with low maintenance front and backyard with plenty of space for kids and pets to run freely in the safety of their own backyard.
Other features include:
- 3-KW solar electricity
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Remote operated double garage
- Storage shed
- Ducted vacuum system
- Drive through access from the garage
- Rain water tank
One of the finest lifestyle property, walking distance to some of the finest parklands, jogging and bike track, wetland, childrens playgrounds, Epping View Primary School, Lyndarum North Shopping precinct, public transport, kindergartens, childcares, short distance drive to Edgars Creek Secondary college, Epping North shopping precinct, Pacific Epping plaza, Epping Train Station and close to health and recreational facilities.
Inspection is a must, enquire today!

Description:
AFFORDABLE LUXURY- $835,000 to $918,000
Simply stunning and second to none, immerse yourself in the luxury of this prestigious home, a true masterpiece of grand proportions situated in one of Epping's most prized locations. From the moment you step inside, you will appreciate the obvious level of quality, sophistication and craftsmanship that extends through every aspect, with an intelligent, practical floor plan brilliantly spread out over 2 levels enhanced by flawless presentation and high end quality finishes. Upstairs boasts 4 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, opulent family bathroom, luxurious master bedroom with large walk in robe and lavish hotel style ensuite with spa bath, beautifully accentuated by slate and mosaic tiles and opening to own private balcony, whilst the huge living area provides teenagers their own retreat and private space. Downstairs showcases a Portico grand entrance, flowing through to a choice of several formal and informal options, revealing rich detailed interiors and highlighting feature marble flooring and intricate mosaic tiling throughout, beautifully complimented by sleek lines and bold, refined touches. The heart and soul of family living, entertaining and gatherings will be around the gourmet open plan kitchen equipped with premium appliances including STOVES 1200mm standalone 6 burner cooker, DeLonghi dishwasher, further enhanced with glossy white 2 pack cabinetry, marble finished breakfast bar and additional L shaped meal preparation area/galley, adjoining meals/dining and family area with built in feature wood fire heater. The generous layout seamlessly merges indoor /outdoor living perfectly, adding another dimension to entertaining, relaxing and enjoyment all year round, with sliding doors opening to gorgeous covered alfresco area, overlooking impressive swim spa pool. Additional features include study room or home office, high end quality finishes, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, split systems, high ceilings, quality light fittings, window furnishings, alarm, huge laundry, massive under house storage/cellar, remote control oversized double garage with internal access, low maintenance manicured gardens plus so much more. Perfectly positioned in a quiet family friendly pocket, surrounded by recreational parklands, picturesque Flinders Creek, walking tracks, walking distance to Lyndarum Town Centre, public transport, just minutes to an excellent choice of schools, Pacific Plaza and Westfield shopping /dining/entertainment precincts. ID REQUIR

Description:
Warm Welcoming Home in Most Desirable Location
This much loved family home is sitting on substantial 585m² of land, boasting 4-spacious bedrooms and has everything you require for a growing family, providing comfort, convenience and space in the ever popular Epping. Four accommodating bedrooms, multiple living areas, including formal lounge and main family living, a well-appointed kitchen that offers stainless steel cooking appliances, walk in pantry and plenty of bench space and adjoining meals area.
Step outside to enjoy large alfresco arena with dedicated barbeque arena to enjoy outdoor living to fullest with friends and family members for years to come. Let your kids and pets run in the safety of your own backyard.
Other notable features include;
4- spacious bedrooms including master bedroom with walk in robes and full ensuite
Substantial block of approx 585m²
Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
Alfresco arenas to entertain and enjoy outdoor living
Remote operated double garage
Storage shed & 2000 litre rain water tank
Lyndarum shops, Aurora Village, Epping Pacific Shopping Centre, Epping Train Station, Northern Hospital, Epping Views Primary School, Harvest Home Primary, Al Siraat College and many more amenities to choose from along with an abundance of parks and walking tracks to use and enjoy makes 60 Hayston Blvd, Epping the ideal home and perfect location to grow your family.
Inspection is a must, enquire today!
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
Great opportunity for first home buyers and investors
Set in a quiet friendly pocket of Epping, superbly located within walking distance to local parks, Epping train station, St Monica's College, easy access to McDonalds Rd, High Street, Westfield Plenty Valley and Pacific Epping. Presenting an excellent opportunity for a first home buyer to enter the market at an affordable level, or a great addition to your portfolio. This humble split level abode offers three bedrooms, an updated central bathroom with spa bath, a light filled living and kitchen below cathedral ceilings, opening up onto a great private decked alfresco area. Enjoy further outdoor space with an ample low maintenance back yard with garden shed.
Additional features include:
Secure lock up garage with drive through access
Further off street parking space
900mm kitchen appliances
Ducted heating
3 phase electricity
Corona Virus inspection policy will be in place to enact social distancing.

Description:
Elegant Living!
Please contact us to arrange a private inspection.
This fabulous contemporary family home presents the epitome of sleek living. Celebrate the seamless flow of flexible entertaining avenues in this well-constructed property. This four bedrooms plus study or 5th bedroom sanctuary opens into a world of unforgettable style with the use of public transport and local sporting facilities in the sought after Aurora Estate.
Upstairs offers three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and luxuriously designed ensuite, central bathroom and spacious retreat area opening onto a private balcony. Downstairs offers formal lounge area, study/5th bedroom plus additional bedroom, open plan gourmet kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops and plenty of cupboard space whilst overlooking your generous family area, in sight of an undercover alfresco with manicured gardens.
Added extras include ducted heating, cooling, feature light fittings, quality window furnishings, double garage with internal access and much more.
An opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
LUXURIOUS LIVING! GREAT LOCATION!
We are open for inspection.
Boasting quintessential modern contemporary living, this exceptional four bedroom plus study room, family home has everything you want, offering warmth and comfort in sought after Lyndarum estate. An impressive double door wide entrance filled with space and light leads to formal lounge, MasterChef kitchen with 900 mm stainless steel appliances overlooking huge open plan living, dining area seamlessly flowing into the rumpus/theatre room. Four spacious bedrooms include opulent master bedroom with full ensuite and WIR, three other bedrooms with BIR and serviced by a sparking central bathroom. Step outside and be surprised with one of the finest low maintenance backyard for kids & pets to run around in the safety of their home and a alfresco to entertain friends and families for years to come.
Delivering plenty of wow factor with its luxurious features which include;
-stone bench tops
-porcelain tiles
-ducted heating, Air-conditioning
-DRIVE THROUGH garage and much more!
Nestled amongst quality homes, on a generous allotment and within walking distance to Epping Views Primary school, childcares, shopping centres, well maintained parklands, health & recreational facilities, and transport. It's an easy choice to call home!
